duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform a variety of facility and grounds cleaning, construction, maintenance, repair, and rehabilitation tasks for public housing facilities.
Under close supervision, learn and perform a variety of duties in routine maintenance and repair of facilities.
Perform semi-skilled maintenance and repair tasks in various craft areas on a training or relief basis.
Recognize and report hazardous and potential maintenance problems.
Maintain basic records of work performed and supplies and materials used.

education_certification.credential: Equivalent of graduation from high school or possession of a GED certification. Some work experience in performing facility or grounds construction maintenance or repair is desirable.
